      • getInstance

        public static AnalyserUtils getInstance()

      • distanceToBeat

        public int distanceToBeat(Beat firstBeat,
                          Beat nextBeat)
        Works out the distance between two beats.
        Parameters:
        firstBeat - the beat from which to assess the distance
        nextBeat - the beat to find the distance to
        Returns:
        the distance between the two beats, or -1 if the nextBeat is in a position before the firstBeat

      • distanceToNextPitch

        public int distanceToNextPitch(Beat beat,
                               java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats)
        Determines the distance to the next pitch beat from the given beat
        Parameters:
        beat - the beat from which to assess the distance
        pitchBeats - the list of beats allocated as pitch beats
        Returns:
        the distance to the next pitch beat

      • getAllBoundaryBeats

        public java.util.List<Beat> getAllBoundaryBeats(HighLevelGroup gGroup,
                                                java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats)

      • identifyBoundaryBeats

        public java.util.List<Beat> identifyBoundaryBeats(java.util.List<Group> groups,
                                                  java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats)
        Identifies the beats which constitute boundary pitch events of the given groups and returns them as a list
        Parameters:
        groups - the groups to be searched for boundary pitches beats
        pitchBeats - the list of beats allocated as pitch instantiation beats
        Returns:
        a list of boundary beats

      • identifyBoundaryBeat

        public Beat identifyBoundaryBeat(Group group,
                                 java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats)
        Used to identify the boundary beat of a group. A boundary beat is the last beat of the group which lands on the inception of a pitch event.
        Parameters:
        group - the group to be checked
        pitchBeats - a list of all beats which are on the inception of a pitch event
        pitchBeats - the list of beats allocated as pitch instantiation beats
        Returns:
        the beat identified as the boundary. If no pitch beat is found, then null is returned.

      • getBeatSpanFromBoundary

        public java.util.List<Beat> getBeatSpanFromBoundary(Beat boundaryBeat,
                                                    Group group,
                                                    java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats)
        This is used to identify the span of beats that surround a boundary beat. The boundary beat need not necessarily be an actual boundary beat.
        Parameters:
        boundaryBeat - the beat to be used in constructing the beat span
        group - the greatest group to constrain the search for the beats
        pitchBeats - the list of beats allocated as pitch instantiation beats within
        Returns:
        the span of beats

      • getBeatSpanFromBeat

        public java.util.List<Beat> getBeatSpanFromBeat(Beat b,
                                                java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats)

                                                    Beat startBeat,
                                                    Beat endBeat)

      • getBoundaryEventsPerLevel

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Group>> getBoundaryEventsPerLevel(java.util.List<Beat> pitchBeats,
                                                                                        HighLevelGroup gGroup)
        Divides the metrical structure into different spans per grouping structure level.
        Parameters:
        pitchBeats - the range of pitch beats
        gGroup - the top grouping structure group
        Returns:
        a map of grouping levels to groups.
